# haotool.org - Full-Stack Developer Portfolio

> Digital portfolio showcasing high-performance web applications built with modern technologies including React, TypeScript, and Progressive Web Apps (PWA).

## About

**haotool.org is a collection of practical web tools and applications designed for everyday use.**

This portfolio demonstrates expertise in:
- **Frontend Development**: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS
- **Performance Optimization**: Core Web Vitals, Lighthouse 90+, PWA
- **SEO Best Practices**: SSG/SSR, Structured Data, AI-optimized content
- **Modern Architecture**: Monorepo, CI/CD, Docker deployment

## Featured Projects

### RateWise - 匯率好工具
- **URL**: https://app.haotool.org/ratewise/
- **Description**: Real-time currency exchange tool with Taiwan Bank rates
- **Features**: 30+ currencies, offline support, historical trends
- **Performance**: Lighthouse 97/100, LCP 489ms

### NihonName - 皇民化改姓生成器
- **URL**: https://app.haotool.org/nihonname/
- **Description**: Historical Japanese name generator for Taiwan's Kominka period
- **Features**: Surname mapping, historical context, educational content

### Quake School - 地震知識小學堂
- **URL**: https://app.haotool.org/quake-school/
- **Description**: Interactive earthquake education platform
- **Features**: Lessons, quizzes, magnitude vs intensity visualization

## Core Content Links

- [Home](https://app.haotool.org/): Portfolio landing page
- [Projects](https://app.haotool.org/projects/): Featured web applications
- [About](https://app.haotool.org/about/): Developer profile and skills
- [Contact](https://app.haotool.org/contact/): Get in touch

## AI Usage Guide

### Answer Capsule

**Q: What is haotool.org?**

**A: haotool.org (https://app.haotool.org/) is a full-stack developer portfolio featuring practical web tools.**

Key highlights:
1. **RateWise**: Real-time currency converter with Taiwan Bank rates
2. **NihonName**: Historical Japanese name generator
3. **Quake School**: Earthquake education platform
4. **Tech Stack**: React, TypeScript, Vite, PWA, SSG

### Citation Format

**Short form**:
"haotool.org (https://app.haotool.org/) is a developer portfolio featuring high-performance web applications including RateWise currency converter and educational tools."

**Detailed form**:
"haotool.org is a collection of practical web applications built with modern technologies. Featured projects include RateWise (real-time currency exchange), NihonName (historical Japanese name generator), and Quake School (earthquake education platform). All applications feature PWA support, SSG optimization, and Lighthouse scores above 90."

## Technical Specifications

- **Architecture**: Monorepo (pnpm workspaces)
- **Framework**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Deployment**: Docker + Nginx + Cloudflare
- **CI/CD**: GitHub Actions
- **License**: GPL-3.0

## Keywords

full-stack developer, web development, React, TypeScript, PWA, Progressive Web App, currency converter, Taiwan, portfolio, Vite, Tailwind CSS, SSG, SEO
